short_summary: Supply and delivery of one school bus
description: Transport Canada (PC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one current production Collins DH Series Type A School Bus.It must meet all specifications
duration_in_months: data is insufficient to determine the duration
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for proposals (RFP) to suppliers for the purchase and delivery of one (1) current production Collins DH Series Type A School Bus. The tender is for Transport Canada (TC).

## Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: WS4469476322
- **Tender Title**: Collins DH Series Type A School Bus
- **Tender Status**: Closed
- **Publication Date**: March 5th, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 5th, 2024 (14:00:00 hours)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements Applies**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Specifications
- The vehicle must be a current production Collins DH Series Type A School Bus, meeting the specifications listed in the tender package.
- The tender is for the supply and delivery of one (1) unit.
- The vehicle must meet all relevant regulations and standards.

## Contact and Procurement
- **Points of Contact**: Stephanie Way (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Location**: PSPC, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada
- **Address Information**: [Please note that the details are provided in the tender package]

## Tender Notice URL
- The complete tender notice can be found on the Ariba Discovery website via this link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18989344?extsite=MTg5ODkzNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
